====Synonyms====
* {{sense|disposition}} {{l|ja|気性|tr=きしょう}}

====Usage notes====
When it refers to weather, this word is used in technical or scientific contexts, and not so often in conversation. In conversation, {{l|ja|天気|tr=てんき}} is more common.
